highlights.text: Traceability as a Service, EON  CircularID Protocol  Connected Products eongroup.co    601    A digital twin is a virtual representation of an object or system that spans its lifecycle, is updated from real-time data, and uses simulation,machine learning and reasoning to help decision-making    602    For example, The solution of the digital twin is the solution foreseen in the Anti-Counterfeiting Blockathon project developed by the EUIntellectual Property Office EUIPO.This on-going
